# YAML Front Matter Test

This document tests the YAML Front Matter functionality.

## Features

- Description meta tag generation
- Keywords meta tag generation (from array)
- Author meta tag generation

## Content

This is a simple test document to verify that:

1. Front Matter is parsed correctly
2. Meta tags are generated with proper HTML escaping
3. Charset meta tag is added to the HTML output
4. Title is still extracted from the first heading
